actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from the windfall profit tax certain charitable organizations which provide assistance to patients.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the windfall profit tax economic interests in crude oil held by charitable organizations which provide medical care to patients with lengthy or terminal illnesses or which provide financial assistance to medical research.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from the windfall profit tax certain charitable organizations which provide assistance to patients.
